test_metadata.methodology: Exact replication of yellow icon testing

casual_entertainer.key_insight: Works for money association but lacks excitement

casino_explorer.key_insight: Energy mismatch with casino excitement needs

trust_seeker.key_insight: EXCEPTIONAL - highest-value demographic loves green for trust

40_plus_years.note: MAJOR REVERSAL - appeal INCREASES with age

calm_safety.note: Double-edged - positive for trust, negative for excitement

strengths.description: 87% link green to money, winning, profit
92% agree highly visible on home screens
strengths.strategic_value: Fast app location during time-critical moments
Unique category fit for sports betting

weaknesses.impact: May underperform for pure entertainment seekers
Conflicts with traditional casino visual language
weaknesses.mitigation: Focus on sports, use warm accents in casino sections

weaknesses.impact: May feel less exclusive than gold
weaknesses.mitigation: Execution excellence, premium shade, quality typography

weaknesses.impact: Lower viral potential with younger users
SEVERE if not backed by genuine trust practices
weaknesses.mitigation: MANDATORY trust delivery, visible licensing, transparency

strategic_positioning.recommendation: GREEN for sustainable business, YELLOW for viral growth

rationale: 4.1/5 rating from Trust Seekers (40+) - highest LTV demographic
+1.6 point improvement over yellow with critical segment
Trust Seekers drive 60-70% of Nordic iGaming revenue
Appeal increases with age (aligned with LTV curve)
conditions_for_success: Deliver genuine trust: Spillemyndigheden license visible
Responsible gambling tools prominent and functional
Security and data protection messaging clear
Cannot be 'greenwashing' - must earn trust operationally
choose_green_if: Strategy prioritizes lifetime value over volume
Sports betting is primary or significant vertical
Can deliver on trust promise with operational excellence
Targeting Nordic market with mature demographic
choose_yellow_if: Strategy prioritizes rapid volume growth and viral acquisition
Excitement over trust as core positioning
choose_neither_if: Premium casino focus requires luxury positioning (consider gold)
Pure casino games without sports (consider purple/gold)
Need maximum excitement without trust priority (consider red)

green_for_trust_strategy.impact: Moderate - may reduce casual acquisition rate
green_for_trust_strategy.mitigation: Premium execution, energetic in-app UI, money messaging

green_for_casino_primary.mitigation: Focus sports positioning, warm casino UI accents, hybrid approach

greenwashing_perception.mitigation: MANDATORY - genuine trust practices, visible licensing, transparency, responsible gambling tools, third-party audits

must_haves: Spillemyndigheden licensing badge on app launch
Responsible gambling tools on main screen
critical_success_factors: GREEN CREATES ACCOUNTABILITY - must deliver trust operationally
Cannot be facade - requires genuine commitment to user protection
Trust must be earned through actions, not just color
Spillemyndigheden license must be immediately visible
Responsible gambling tools must be accessible and functional
Security and transparency must be genuine

next_actions: Review comparative analysis: Green vs Yellow performance
Answer strategic questions: LTV vs volume priority
Confirm primary vertical: sports vs casino vs mixed
Make color decision: GREEN (recommended based on data)
If GREEN: Design shade variations and typography
If GREEN: Prepare trust delivery infrastructure
Validate with real Danish users (50+, focus on 40+ demo)
Launch with trust messaging and monitoring

final_verdict.key_advantage: Wins with highest-value demographic while maintaining differentiation
final_verdict.acceptable_tradeoff: Lower excitement appeal is acceptable given massive trust gains
final_verdict.critical_requirement: Must deliver genuine trust - not optional
final_verdict.business_impact: Optimizes for sustainable growth and retention over viral volume
final_verdict.competitive_position: Unique trust-first positioning in excitement-dominated market
